page.title: 13FUN RUN/WALK (HALF MARATHON)
page.content: Every April a fun run or walk , half marathon is run from Chapel St. Leonards pullover to Skegness South car park and back.The route runs along the promenade and sea defence top,past butlins and small sections have to be run on the beach.The competitions change at plants cafe in the village centre and the race begins outside the cafe.The walkes start behind.The runners are usually sponsored and the ST.Johns Ambulance brigade provide medical attention if required.The funds from the run go to Chapel St.Leonards P.T.F.A.who are resiting a learner swimming pool at the new school.The winning competer in 1985 ran the race in 1 hour 30 minutes.People from ages 12 to 60 take part.
